sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=async(props)=> { let f=await props.contract.methods.getreqNo().call() const info=new Array(f).fill().map(()=>new Array(6)) const requestInfo=async()=>{ info.map(async(element, index) => { await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(index).call(); }) } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); console.log("contract:",props.contract) },[props.refresh]) return (
{console.log("reqnumber",f)} {console.log("contract",props.contract)} Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed { info.slice(0,info.length).map((e,index)=>( {index} {info[0]} {info[1]} {info[2]} {info[3]} {info[4]}/{info[5]} {info[6]} )) } {/* {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {index} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} {completed} ) )} */}
) } export default ShowRequest
